description: A simple and satisfying Vegan Banana Smoothie that is healthy, easy to make & packed with protein. It's rich, thick, creamy, tastes like banana bread & will keep you feeling full for ages!
keywords: banana smoothie, vegan banana smoothie, vegan smoothie
name: Vegan Banana Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup (33 grams) oats (, rolled or quick oats)
2 tablespoons walnuts or pecans (, or a heaping tablespoon of nut or seed butter)
1 medjool dates (, or 1 tablespoon maple syrup)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ingredients to a blender. Start with just 3/4 cup (180 mls) of milk and add more later if necessary.
Blend until completely smooth. See how the texture is for you. This smoothie is great served quite thick but if you want it thinner add the rest of the milk and blend again for a couple of seconds.
